profile.name: Johnson Chen
profile.title: Artist • Coder • Board Game Enthusiast
profile.description: I'm a passionate high school senior who loves combining creativity with technology. Whether I'm painting a new canvas, coding an innovative app, or strategizing over a board game, I'm always looking for ways to solve problems and bring people together through shared experiences.

projects.title: Board Game Meetup App
projects.description: A React app connecting board game enthusiasts for local meetups. Features real-time chat, event scheduling, and game library integration.

projects.title: Memory Quest
projects.description: A board game-themed memory matching game with progressive difficulty levels and beautiful artwork inspired by classic board games.

awards.title: IYAC Global Youth Art Contest (Golden Award)
awards.description: Golden Award recipient at the IYAC Global Youth Art Contest.

awards.title: Social Justice Awards (Third Prize)
awards.description: Third Prize recognition for social justice themed work.

awards.title: National PTA Reflections
awards.description: Recognized in the National PTA Reflections program.

awards.title: “Happy Degart 2023” International Kids Art Contest
awards.description: Honorable Mentioned in the 'Happy Degart 2023' International Kids Art Contest under Mixed Media category.

activities.title: UCLA Summer Art Institute
activities.description: Studio-based intensive in the visual arts.

activities.title: American Mental Development Research and Education Organization
activities.description: Participation in research and education initiatives.

activities.title: CCDEC Club Board
activities.description: Board member supporting club activities and operations.

activities.title: U.S. House of Representatives, Congressional App Challenges
activities.description: Participation in the Congressional App Challenge.

activities.title: Second Harvest Food Bank of Orange County
activities.organization: Second Harvest Food Bank of Orange County
activities.description: Volunteer support for community food distribution events.

activities.title: Los Angeles Marathon
activities.description: Event-day volunteer support for race operations.

activities.title: Irvine Global Village
activities.description: Volunteer support at the multicultural community festival.
activities.impact: Assisted with community engagement and activities.

activities.title: Los Angeles Dodgers Foundation Sunset Run 2025
activities.description: Volunteer support for the Sunset Run 2025 event.
activities.impact: Assisted with participant support and event operations.

artworks.title: Shake A Hand With The Past
artworks.description: Recreated a hand-shaped sculpture using feathers to reflect my emotional transition during a major turning point in my life.

artworks.title: Their Shadow Embrace Me
artworks.description: A series of transparent resin sculptures cast from the hands of important people in my life, exploring how their presence and memories shaped my identity.

artworks.title: I Do Remember
artworks.description: A portrait of a friend I may never meet again, created to preserve the emotional weight of farewell.

artworks.title: Isolation
artworks.description: An oil painting addressing school bullying, submitted to the Social Justice Award.

artworks.title: Who’ll E’er Feel Sorry For Those Who Were Lost
artworks.description: Inspired by a Chinese poem sentence curved on a wooden table in Stanford Library that said: “Border mountains are difficult to cross – Who'll e'er feel sorry for those who were lost?” Created by acrylic paints on transparent PVC.

artworks.title: Internal Friction
artworks.description: Created with blades on paper, depicting how memories can generate internal tension and emotional harm.
